metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Execution Of Regasm/Regsvcs With Uncommon Extension
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious execution of the Regasm/Regsvcs utilities with an uncommon extension.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\regsvcs.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\regasm.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('regsvcs\\.exe', 'regasm\\.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.gif')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpeg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.png')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.txt'))))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious execution of the Regasm/Regsvcs utilities with an uncommon extension.
